name: Syntax Designer
description:
For creating high fidelity mockups or designing custom syntaxes. Some examples include: demonstrating a source code plugin, trialing a new language, creating a mockups with source code present.

Drag and drop nodes and change their instances easily while preserving the names of nodes you've edited. Edit the base nodes to change the themes of all nodes, or edit the language specific nodes individually.

Supported languages:
- HTML
- CSS
- JS
- PHP
